description: Move you camera until white dots will display in your screen. Touch at any white dots to start your learning!
Alright class, today we're going on a journey through the amazing organization of life!
Living things exist in a complex hierarchy, with each level building upon the last.
Your mission imagine a ladder, but instead of climbing up steps,
we'll be arranging the different levels of biological organization in their proper order
from the tiniest building blocks to the vast living world.
Here's what you'll be doing I'll provide you  with a set of blocks
containing the different levels of biological organization. Then arrange them in the right order
Simple right? Are you now ready?
Good job!! You arranged them in the right order! You perfected the assessment task
